original: de bzhin du /🔽ha ra ti /
analyzed: de bzhin du / ha ra ti /
translated: Similarly,🔽harati,

original: ha ra te /
analyzed: ha ra te /
translated: harate,

original: hri nya 'phrog / yadza sogs rnams las /🔽ya dza ti /
analyzed: hri nya 'phrog / yadza sogs rnams las / ya dza ti /
translated: and from yaj and so forth,🔽yajati,

original: ya dza ti /🔽ba ha ti /
analyzed: ya dza ti / ba ha ti /
translated: yajate,🔽bharati,

original: ba ha te /🔽tu da ti /
analyzed: ba ha te / tu da ti /
translated: bharate,🔽tudati,

original: tu da te /
analyzed: tu da te /
translated: tudante,

original: ya dza lha mchod pa /
analyzed: ya dza lha mchod pa /
translated: yaj is to worship,

original: baha thob pa /
analyzed: baha thob pa /
translated: bhar is to obtain,

original: tuda gdung ba /
analyzed: tuda gdung ba /
translated: tud is to torment,

original: tuda sogs kyi aana la zhes pas yon tan med do //
analyzed: tuda sogs kyi aana la zhes pas yon tan med do //
translated: and the “a” of the “a” of tud and so forth is the absence of the feminine.

original: kra mi las nyer bsgyur med pa las gnyis ka bshad par bya ste /🔽kr'a ma ti /
analyzed: kra mi las nyer bsgyur med pa las gnyis ka bshad par bya ste / kr'a ma ti /
translated: From krama, the two are explained from the non-affix.🔽Kramatī,

original: kr'a ma te /
analyzed: kr'a ma te /
translated: kramate,

original: pa rasmee zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: pa rasmee zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: and from parasmāt, the long.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa las zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa las zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the non-affix?

original: sam kr'a ma ti /
analyzed: sam kr'a ma ti /
translated: Samkramatī.

original: a'am las pha rol 'od zer 'gyed pa'i don la a'atma ne'i tshig bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: a'am las pha rol 'od zer 'gyed pa'i don la a'atma ne'i tshig bshad par bya ste /
translated: From ā, the word ātmani is explained in the sense of emitting light to the other side.

original: a'a kram te ra bi /
analyzed: a'a kram te ra bi /
translated: Ākraṃte ravi.

original: 'od zer 'gyed pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'od zer 'gyed pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is emitting light?

original: a'a kr'a ma ti dh'u mo hamya ta lam\/
analyzed: a'a kr'a ma ti dh'u mo hamya ta lam\/
translated: Ākramatī dhūmoham yata.

original: khyad par 'di lta bu'i yul du gnyi ga bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: khyad par 'di lta bu'i yul du gnyi ga bshad par bya ste /
translated: In this way, the two are explained in this particular case.

original: des na gang la bdag gi don gyi bya ba'i 'bras bu de la a'atma ne'i tshig dang gang la gzhan gyi don de la ni pa rasmee'i tshig go //
analyzed: des na gang la bdag gi don gyi bya ba'i 'bras bu de la a'atma ne'i tshig dang gang la gzhan gyi don de la ni pa rasmee'i tshig go //
translated: Therefore, the word ātman is used for the result of the action for one's own sake, and the word parasmai is used for the sake of another.

original: des na / ya dza te ;🔽ya dza m'a ne:/
analyzed: des na / ya dza te ; ya dza m'a ne:/
translated: Thus, the application of yajate,🔽yajamāna,

original: ya dzanti / y'a dza k'a /
analyzed: ya dzanti / y'a dza k'a /
translated: yajanti, yājayet,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba nges par grub bo //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba nges par grub bo //
translated: and so on is definitely established.

original: san'i mtha' las snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: san'i mtha' las snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The ending of san is as before.

original: sana'i rkyen gyi mtha' las snga ma bzhin a'atma ne'i tshig gam gnyis ka 'gyur ro //🔽san las snga ma'i byings las a'atma ne'i tshig sogs @180a * //
analyzed: sana'i rkyen gyi mtha' las snga ma bzhin a'atma ne'i tshig gam gnyis ka 'gyur ro // san las snga ma'i byings las a'atma ne'i tshig sogs @180a * //
translated: From the ending of the causal condition, as before, the word ātman or both are formed.

original: 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de san mtha'i yang 'dod do //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de san mtha'i yang 'dod do //
translated: The reason why the word ātman and so on come from the previous root from san is also asserted for the ending of san.

original: des na ji ltar du tsa sogs 'ba' zhig rnams las a'atma ne'i tshig yin pa de ltar san mtha' rnams las kyang ngo //🔽ru ro tsisha te /
analyzed: des na ji ltar du tsa sogs 'ba' zhig rnams las a'atma ne'i tshig yin pa de ltar san mtha' rnams las kyang ngo // ru ro tsisha te /
translated: Therefore, just as the word ātman is from only du and so on, so it is also from the endings of san.🔽Rucirucchate,

original: ro tsi tu mitstsha ti /
analyzed: ro tsi tu mitstsha ti /
translated: rucirucchitumicchati,

original: tu mtha'i byings las las dang 'dod pa dang zhes pas sana\'o //
analyzed: tu mtha'i byings las las dang 'dod pa dang zhes pas sana\'o //
translated: From the root to do (kṛ), to desire (icch), and to be (bhū), the suffix -tva is added.

original: aita'o // gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: aita'o // gnyis brjod do //
translated: The word two (dvaya) is added.

original: ru tsa sogs san\ mtha' las kyang a'atma ne'i tshig te'o //🔽shi sha yi sha te /
analyzed: ru tsa sogs san\ mtha' las kyang a'atma ne'i tshig te'o // shi sha yi sha te /
translated: From the root to be (as), the word -tva is added.

original: sh'ing\ nyal ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'ing\ nyal ba la'o //
translated: The word to sleep (śay) is added.

original: nyal bar 'dod do zhes sana'o //
analyzed: nyal bar 'dod do zhes sana'o //
translated: The word to desire to sleep (śayitukāma) is added.

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //
translated: The word two (dvaya) is added.

original: yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan no //
translated: The word quality (guṇa) is added.

original: nga rjes su 'brel pa nyid las a'atma ne'i tshig go //
analyzed: nga rjes su 'brel pa nyid las a'atma ne'i tshig go //
translated: The word -tva is added from the suffix to be related to (aṇ).

original: p'a pa tsi sha te /
analyzed: p'a pa tsi sha te /
translated: The word to cook (pac) is added.

original: shin tu 'tshed par 'dod do'i don la byings las dbyangs gcig pa zhes pas ya sgra'o //
analyzed: shin tu 'tshed par 'dod do'i don la byings las dbyangs gcig pa zhes pas ya sgra'o //
translated: The word -tva is added from the root to desire to cook very much (pacitukāma), with the suffix -ya.

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //
translated: The word two (dvaya) is added.

original: a'a ga ma med pa'i ring po'o //
analyzed: a'a ga ma med pa'i ring po'o //
translated: The word long (dīrgha) is without āgama.

original: sana\'o // aita'o //🔽aa'i nga dbyi'o //🔽ya'i aan\ min pa la zhes pas ya dbyi'o //
analyzed: sana\'o // aita'o // aa'i nga dbyi'o // ya'i aan\ min pa la zhes pas ya dbyi'o //
translated: The word to be (as) is added.🔽The word to be (as) is added from the suffix -aṇ.

original: tse kr'i yi ta'i mtha' las zhes pas san\ mtha' las a'atma ne'i tshig go //
analyzed: tse kr'i yi ta'i mtha' las zhes pas san\ mtha' las a'atma ne'i tshig go //
translated: The word -tva is added from the root to be (as), with the suffix -tva.

original: mring srog gtong ba la'o zhes pas 'di san mtha'i snga ma bzhin mi 'dod do //
analyzed: mring srog gtong ba la'o zhes pas 'di san mtha'i snga ma bzhin mi 'dod do //
translated: The word to give up life (mṛtyu) is added, but the previous -tva is not desired.

original: des na a'atma ne'i tshig mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na a'atma ne'i tshig mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the word ātman does not change.

original: mu mursha ti /
analyzed: mu mursha ti /
translated: mumūrṣati.

original: gcod par 'dod do la sana'o //
analyzed: gcod par 'dod do la sana'o //
translated: One wishes to cut off.

original: dbyangs mtha' rnams kyi san la'o zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: dbyangs mtha' rnams kyi san la'o zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: The long ones are by the rule of the final vowels.

original: mchur gyur pa au pa dh'a zhes pas aura\'o //
analyzed: mchur gyur pa au pa dh'a zhes pas aura\'o //
translated: The one that has become a lip is oupadha.

original: n'a mi'i ra ba dag ces pas ring po'o //
analyzed: n'a mi'i ra ba dag ces pas ring po'o //
translated: The long ones are by the rule of the nāmi rāva.

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //
translated: The two are expressed.

original: thung ngu'o // lhag ma las byed pa po la pa rasmee'i tshig go //
analyzed: thung ngu'o // lhag ma las byed pa po la pa rasmee'i tshig go //
translated: The short ones. The remaining ones are the words of the agent.

original: gang gi phyir a'atma ne'i tshig sogs kyis ma brjod pa de ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir a'atma ne'i tshig sogs kyis ma brjod pa de ni lhag ma'o //
translated: That which is not expressed by the words ātman and so on is the remaining one.

original: de'ang rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: de'ang rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: Moreover, it is twofold.

original: byings lhag ma dang rkyen lhag ma'o //
analyzed: byings lhag ma dang rkyen lhag ma'o //
translated: The remaining one is the remaining base and the remaining condition.

original: lhag ma las byings las byed pa po'i don la pa rasmee'i tshig 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma las byings las byed pa po'i don la pa rasmee'i tshig 'gyur ro //
translated: From the remaining ones, the word of the agent is changed to parasmāt.

original: re zhig rkyen lhag ma rnams /
analyzed: re zhig rkyen lhag ma rnams /
translated: First, the remaining conditions.

original: pu tr'i ya ti /
analyzed: pu tr'i ya ti /
translated: putratyaiti.

original: bha ba ti /
analyzed: bha ba ti /
translated: bhavati.🔽yāti.

original: y'a ti / wa ti /
analyzed: y'a ti / wa ti /
translated: vati.

original: bhu yod pa la'o //
analyzed: bhu yod pa la'o //
translated: bhū is for existence.

original: y'a thob pa la'o //
analyzed: y'a thob pa la'o //
translated: yā is for attainment.

original: wa rtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: wa rtogs pa la'o //
translated: va is for realization.

original: ti'o // aandi //
analyzed: ti'o // aandi //
translated: ti is for and so on.

original: sad sogs las 'jig go //
analyzed: sad sogs las 'jig go //
translated: sad and so on are for destruction.

original: bha bhu ba /
analyzed: bha bhu ba /
translated: bhavabhū.

original: ya yoo ; / ba boo //
analyzed: ya yoo ; / ba boo //
translated: va vo.🔽pa ro.

original: pa ro& ksha'i aata'o //
analyzed: pa ro& ksha'i aata'o //
translated: kṣī aṭo.

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //
translated: The two are expressed.

original: bha ba ti'i bhu'i mtha' las wa'o zhes pas wa yig a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: bha ba ti'i bhu'i mtha' las wa'o zhes pas wa yig a'a ga ma'o //
translated: From the end of bhavati bhū, it is va. Thus, the va syllable is āgama.

original: a'a yig las aata aoo'o //
analyzed: a'a yig las aata aoo'o //
translated: From the ā syllable, aṭ is āu.

original: mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge la'ang ngo zhes pas a'a dbyi'o //
analyzed: mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge la'ang ngo zhes pas a'a dbyi'o //
translated: It is also in the case of a connecting letter. Thus, the ā vowel.

original: byed pa po la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa po la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the agent?🔽 gamya te.

original: ga mya te /
analyzed: ga mya te /
translated: gra āḥ.

original: gr'a @180b ma:/ bhu dza las zas kyi don la a'atma ne'i tshig bshad par bya ste /🔽aa bhya ba h'a ro bho dza nam bhum kshe p'a ya sam /
analyzed: gr'a @180b ma:/ bhu dza las zas kyi don la a'atma ne'i tshig bshad par bya ste / aa bhya ba h'a ro bho dza nam bhum kshe p'a ya sam /
translated: From bhuja, the word ātmani is to be explained in the sense of food.🔽 abhyavahāro bhojanaṃ bhuṅkṣe 'haṃ.

original: bhudza skyong ba dang zas la'o //
analyzed: bhudza skyong ba dang zas la'o //
translated: Bhuja is for nourishing and food.

original: rudha sogs las dbyangs las pha rol du na sgra'o //
analyzed: rudha sogs las dbyangs las pha rol du na sgra'o //
translated: From rudha and so on, the sound na is from the other side of the vowel.

original: rudha sogs kyi bi ka ra na'i mtha' dbyi'o //
analyzed: rudha sogs kyi bi ka ra na'i mtha' dbyi'o //
translated: The end of the vikaraṇa of rudha and so on is the vowel.

original: tsa sde'i ki'o //
analyzed: tsa sde'i ki'o //
translated: The ki of the ca group.

original: skyong bar byed pa la ni pa rasmee'i tshig ste /
analyzed: skyong bar byed pa la ni pa rasmee'i tshig ste /
translated: For the one who nourishes, the word parasmāt is used.

original: bhu nakti pri thvim /
analyzed: bhu nakti pri thvim /
translated: bhuṅkte pṛthivīm.

original: aa nu dang pa r'a dag las pha rol gyi krinya las pa rasmee kho na bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: aa nu dang pa r'a dag las pha rol gyi krinya las pa rasmee kho na bshad par bya'o //
translated: From anu and para, only parasmāt is to be explained from the other side of kṛt.🔽 anu karoti.

original: aa nu ka ro ti /
analyzed: aa nu ka ro ti /
translated: Anukaroti.🔽

original: pa r'a ka ro ta ti /
analyzed: pa r'a ka ro ta ti /
translated: Parākrama.

original: nya rjes su 'brel pa las gnyi ga thob pa la'o //🔽aa dhi / pra ti /
analyzed: nya rjes su 'brel pa las gnyi ga thob pa la'o // aa dhi / pra ti /
translated: Adhi-prati- from the root √kṣip, to obtain both.

original: aa dhi / aa bhi rnams las pha rol gyi kshi pa las so //🔽aa dhi kshi pa ti /
analyzed: aa dhi / aa bhi rnams las pha rol gyi kshi pa las so // aa dhi kshi pa ti /
translated: Adhi- prati- from the root √kṣip, to obtain both.🔽Adhi-kṣipati.

original: pra ti kshi pa ti ;🔽yadza sogs nyid las gnyis ka thob pa'o //
analyzed: pra ti kshi pa ti ; yadza sogs nyid las gnyis ka thob pa'o //
translated: Prati-kṣipati.🔽Yaj- etc. from the root √kṣip, to obtain both.

original: pra las pha rol gyi ba hi las so //
analyzed: pra las pha rol gyi ba hi las so //
translated: Prā- from the root √vah, to obtain both.

original: phra ba ha ti /🔽sngar bzhin gnyis ka thob pa la'o //
analyzed: phra ba ha ti / sngar bzhin gnyis ka thob pa la'o //
translated: Prā-vah.🔽As before, to obtain both.

original: pa ri las pha rol gyi mrisha las so //
analyzed: pa ri las pha rol gyi mrisha las so //
translated: Pari- from the root √mṛś, to obtain both.

original: pa ri mri shya ti /
analyzed: pa ri mri shya ti /
translated: Pari-mṛśati.

original: 'dir yang gnyi ga thob pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang gnyi ga thob pa la'o //
translated: Here also, to obtain both.

original: bi / a'ang\/ pa ri /
analyzed: bi / a'ang\/ pa ri /
translated: Vi-aṅ-pari-

original: au pa rnams las pha rol gyi ram\ las so //
analyzed: au pa rnams las pha rol gyi ram\ las so //
translated: Upa- from the root √ram, to obtain both.

original: bi ra ma ti /
analyzed: bi ra ma ti /
translated: Vi-ramata.

original: pa ri ra ma ti /🔽a'a ra ma ti /
analyzed: pa ri ra ma ti / a'a ra ma ti /
translated: Pari-ramata.🔽Aṅ-ramata.

original: au pa ra ma ti /
analyzed: au pa ra ma ti /
translated: Upa-ramata.

original: rutsa sogs nyid las a'atma ne'i tshig thob pa la'o //
